data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Minaei, Kambiz, Mound, Laurence (2019): Reduced antennal segmentation in a new species from Iran of the genus Aeolothrips (Thysanoptera: Aeolothripidae). Zootaxa 4683 (3): 447-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.3.9|5 occurrences
